name: Mazed Robot
description:
A game made for Ludum Dare 47!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/mazed-robot

Earn as much points as you can before the time runs out.

You gain extra time when you complete a level. It costs one point to shoot, so don't waste your score!

Control with IJKL or arrow keys, select and shoot with F key. Jump with space. If stuck or falling out of level, press esc to get to beginning of level.
The robot is stuck in a loop of levels, gain as high score as possible!
